pages.text: All of these mods listed in this category (and likely others that I have in my personal game) were all tested together. I recommend you use all of them, as that’s how they were tested with my modpack.$(br2)I will most likely add these (2) mods to BaerCraft in the future, however, with the amount of incompatibilities on servers, there’s evidence showing there’s also $(italic)minor$()

issues on the client’s side. Performance mods can really break things, so I want to wait on adding them, to avoid breaking anyone’s game.$(br2)You have the option to install them yourself, but $(#ff0000)be warned:$() these mods have the potential to absolutely destroy your worlds! I have not experienced this, nor anything close, but the chance is always there.
